ygData.subject: RE: Binding Points
ygData.msgSnippet: Thank you fellow paladins may Erollisi Marr smile upon thy destinies. T is good to know I may spare my sore feet some long walks in the future. Njelm raises
ygData.messageBody:
Thank you fellow paladins may Erollisi Marr smile upon thy destinies.

T'is good to know I may spare my sore feet some long walks in the future.


Njelm raises his tankard and cheers at thee.

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Guillaume Voizard [SMTP:gvoizard@...]
> Sent: den 11 augusti 1999 10:40
> To: eqpaladin@onelist.com
> Subject: RE: [eqpaladin] Binding Points
>
> From: Guillaume Voizard <gvoizard@...>
>
> >Greater Faydark is considered as city zone, so you cam bind in any place
> >where. As i heard, same stays for High Hold Keep and Arena near Lake
> >Rathetear.
>
> Greater Faydark is a city zone, because it is the zone of Kelethin.
> You can be bound in HighPass too because it is a city (merchants...), and
> may be in High Keep, I would not be surprised.
> And I confirm about the Arena too.
>
> Erwin, Paladin of Tunare, Fennin Ro.
>
